revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Broadsoft |model=Micro Appliance |revision=PI-100 (PIPR1001CE) |is_manuf=No |pcb_id=PIPR1001CE |type=VoIP gateway |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Micrel |cpu1_model=KSZ8695PX |cpu1_cspeed=166 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL064N90TFI06 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=S42S32800D-6BLI |serial=yes,, 10-pin header,, 3.3V TTL |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=100M |addl_chips=3V RS232 Transceiver;Texas Instruments;MAX3243C;;1;,,, 500mA Low-Noise LDO Regulator;Microchip;MIC5209;;2;,,, Dual D-Type Positive Edge-Triggered Flip-Flop;TI;SN74LS74A;;1;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive NOR Gate;TI;SN74LVC02A;;1;,,, Hex Schmitt-Trigger Inverter;TI;SN74LVC14A;;1;,,, TVS Diode Array;Littelfuse;SP720ABG;;1; |oui_eth=40:D8 }} {{TagLine|Broadsoft PI-100 Micro Appliance}}
"PIPR1001CE" is silkscreened on board top.
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Micrel]] KSZ8695PX :SoC: ARM922T @166MHz *Storage: 8MB (NOR) Flash *Memory: 32MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Network: 3x Fast Ethernet ports *Power: 5V/1A via barrel plug
==Images== <gallery> File:Broadsoft PI-100 Top.jpeg|Board top File:Broadsoft PI-100 Bottom.jpeg|Board bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
